library(here)

```{r tech variability as function of amp efficiency and biomass}
exampledf <- read.csv(here("/special_issue_manuscript/Data/gold_example_data.csv"))

biomass.ampeff.vs.techvar <- function(exampledf){

abundance_amp_bins_df <- data.frame(exampledf,abundance_bin=cut(exampledf$abundance,as.numeric(quantile(exampledf$abundance)),include.lowest=TRUE),
ampef_bin = cut(exampledf$amp_ef,unique(as.numeric(quantile(exampledf$amp_ef))),include.lowest=TRUE))
 
 abundance_amp_uniquebins <-  unique(abundance_amp_bins_df[,15:16])
    

  
}



```
